Definition: 149597870700 m approx. Distance from Earth to Sun
Distance from fingers to elbow approx. 18 in
Legally defined as 1.033 English feet in 1859
approx. equals 1 hour walk, Currently defined in US as 3 Statute miles, but historically varied from 2 to 9 km
Distance light travels in one second in vacuum
Distance light travels in vacuum in 365.25 days
Distance light travels in 1/299792458 of a second in vacuum. approx. equals 1/10000000 of the distance from equator to pole.
648000/pi AU; Distant point with a parallax shift of one arc second from a base of one astronomical unit.
